extendedInfo.description: â Where can I find theme+ for 9s Weather ?1.after installed 9s-Weather, in-app > Menu > Theme2.Search "9s-Weather Theme+" at Android Marketâ NoteFor living up those "Theme+", you need to install 9s-Weather first!!To provide you with more THEME+ to decorate your home screen, 9s-Weather now offers two more types of widgets even with clock function. 9s-Weather is of fascinating graphical animations, making you have a smarter intuitive and lively mobile weather forecast.Quick Overview:>2x1,4x1,4x2,4x4 widgets available>With clock function (4x2/4x4 Widgets)>UI,Wind,Humidity info>Clock to alarm>Animated movement>3-day forecast>Current weather information>Google Satellite Map>Accuweather database>C/F supported>MPH/KPH supported

reviews.title: Widgets do not update.
reviews.comment: As above widgets not updating on huawei ascend mate running jellybean 4. 1. 2, and no i\'m not killing the widgets with a task-killer, paid for a theme to, gutted.

reviews.title: Not all that
reviews.comment: Some of the best annimations I have seen, BUT, I also use my weather widget to acces my alarms and calendar.  no setting to activate them, although he advertises that you can.  look fo something else

reviews.title: Perfect! :)
reviews.comment: This app has everything I wanted in a free weather (with clock) app! :) The time, date,actual weather/degree in my location, and it has the perdiction of the next days weather all in a 4x2 widget! :) I\'m sold on this one!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool weather app!!!
reviews.comment: I love how the weather changes from sunrise to sunset,that\'s great!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good App....
reviews.comment: I especially like the 4x2 widget. Only 4 stars though because the numbers & letters are a little hard to see sometimes. If you could change the color that would be nice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolute Best!!  Michael
reviews.comment: I have spent days trying them all most want to be paid when you put up the 4 X 4 widget not here you get one beautiful widget which is easy to setup not like the others. Don\'t waste time believe me this is the one. If there were six stars that is what it would be. Again stop here the best. Can you please add the option to choose MPH? Thanks

reviews.title: Hokie
reviews.comment: Rudimentary animations with juvenile background options.  A \"so-so\" App. in my book.   :-(
